## Data types
### Integers
```{python}
type(100)
```

### Floating-point numbers
```{python}
type(3.14)
```

### Strings
```{python}
type("Hello world!")
```

### Boolean
```{python}
type(True)
```

### Lists
```{python}
type(["Audi", "BMW", "Mercedes"])
```

### Tuples
```{python}
type(("SUV", "saloon/sedan", "hatchback"))
```

### Dictionaries
```{python}
type({"make": "Suzuki", "model": "Alto"})
```

### Sets
```{python}
type({1, 2, 3, 5, 7})
```

## Math operators
### Addition
```{python}
3 + 5
```

### Subtraction
```{python}
100 - 20
```

### Multiplication
```{python}
2 * 5
```

### Division
```{python}
100 / 2
```

### Integer division/floored quotient
```{python}
23 // 4
```

### Modulus/remainder
```{python}
23 % 4
```

### Exponentiation
```{python}
10 ** 2
```

## Reading and writing files
```{python}
file_ref = open("example.txt", "w")
file_ref.write("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog")
file_ref.close()
```

```{python}
with open("example.txt") as file:
    print(file.read())
```
